item.title: 本周二，旧金山选民将对两项提案进行权衡。提案 E 将赋予警方更多权力，让他们可以使用监控摄像头和无人机；提案 F 将要求领取福利金的单身成年人接受吸毒筛查。
item.description:
San Francisco voters on Tuesday will be weighing in on two propositions. Proposition E would grant police more powers, giving them surveillance cameras and use of drones, and Proposition F would require single adults on welfare to be screened for drug use. pic.twitter.com/yEBAGoeefk

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 根据美联社-NORC 最近的一项民意调查，十分之六的美国成年人表示，他们对拜登或特朗普担任总统的心理能力没有太大信心。
item.description:
Six in ten U.S. adults said they don’t have much confidence in Biden or Trump’s mental capabilities to serve as president, according to a recent AP-NORC poll.

AP’s Josh Boak explains more about this ahead of the upcoming presidential election. pic.twitter.com/fyIsVPa08P

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 4, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：立法者在一次历史性的议会联席会议上批准了一项法案，妇女堕胎的权利将被写入法国宪法。
item.description:
